A 40 Myr Old Gaseous Circumstellar Disk at 49 Ceti: Massive CO-Rich

  Comet Clouds at Young A-Type Stars

wikipedia.title: Exocomet
wikipedia.summary: An exocomet, or extrasolar comet, is a comet outside the Solar System, including interstellar comets and comets that orbit stars other than the Sun.

wikipedia.title: Exokomet
wikipedia.summary: En exokomet eller extrasolr komet, r en komet utanfr solsystemet, inklusive interstellra kometer och kometer runt andra stjrnor n solen.

wikipedia.title: 49 Ceti
wikipedia.summary: 49 Ceti is a star in the constellation of Cetus. Its apparent magnitude is 5.607. It is 194 light-years, or 59.4 parsecs away from the Solar System, based on its parallax.
